metadata.synopsis: Krustine, the Mistress of Souls in the Colony Barracks, recognizes the Dark Urge.She previously watched over the Dark Urge in their pod and became obsessed with them.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe barracks_assault"- Use the origin debugbook to recruit the Dark Urge (Ctrl+Shift+7 - More... - Dark Urge ...)- The Dark Urge gets spotted by Krustine, Mistress of Souls

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: *She is but the hack-doctor who half-pieced you together, after whatever caused your head to get in this mess.*
37.context: NodeContext: Overjoyed, happy to see you again

29.speaker: Narrator
29.text: *Someone else must have attacked you, in the midst of whatever you were doing down here.*

47.speaker: Narrator
47.text: *This necromancer was a grunt in the scheme of the horrors enacted against you. That attacker is the source.*

51.speaker: Narrator
51.text: *In the heart of all these membranes, there was a dagger awaiting you all along. But from who?*

54.speaker: Narrator
54.text: Ponder why you were down here before.

13.speaker: Narrator
13.text: *You were no Myrkul cultist, that much is sure. You sense in your soul you were something far greater.*

14.text: Scowl: She didn't do a great job of fixing me.

10.speaker: Narrator
10.text: *Her experiments may well have made the damage worse.*

60.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
60.text: Urgh, Lashers, Balthazar let one of his walking carcasses lapse from his control... Let's ferry them back.
60.context: NodeContext: Overjoyed, happy to see you again

7.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
7.text: Wait... By the Bone Lord, it's you!
7.context: NodeContext: Overjoyed, happy to see you again

30.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
30.text: I thought I'd never see you again ...
30.context: NodeContext: Overjoyed, happy to see you again

23.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
23.text: I wanted to keep you for myself but they shipped you away.

6.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
6.text: I don't know what you're talking about, but you're going to tell me everything.

39.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
39.text: You talk? How is that possible? Something must've gone wrong.

25.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
25.text: Keep me? What did you do to me?

28.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
28.text: You talk? And you are aware? How is that possible?

17.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
17.text: Oh, but what an arresting voice you have!

57.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
57.text: You're not supposed to be here, special one. That's not right. But I don't want to damage you.

43.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
43.text: You were my very first, after all. I learnt everything about the parasites from you.

1.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
1.text: I remember finding you close to death, beaten black and blue on the floor of this sanctum. It must have been a few hours after the tadpole was placed in your skull.

42.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
42.text: How you got here was a total mystery, but I stitched you up just enough to keep you alive, then placed you within your crib.

15.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
15.text: I kept you as mine until you were needed by our superiors.

53.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
53.text: We had such a close bond. I opened you up endlessly with my scalpels, and got lost in your insides.

12.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
12.text: This is where I was left after someone infected me?

48.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
48.text: I was not behind it - I do not know. But whoever did it, I'm so glad they left you here for me.

20.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
20.text: I was 'needed' in the Absolute's plan? For what?

3.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
3.text: The most important work, the nature of which I only heard whispers of.

22.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
22.text: Truthfully, I'm not surprised to see you found your way back here all by yourself. I always knew you were clever.

19.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
19.text: It has never been the same with another... All the other victims who come here just meekly obey. You thrashed, you fought, you were indomitable.

46.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
46.text: But as special as you are, you shouldn't be swanning around here, acting as if free will is yours again.

49.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
49.text: We're going to kill you, sweet one. But I promise I will stay with you afterwards.

33.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
33.text: Lashers... bring this one back to my table! And prepare my knives for a long night of experiments!

31.text: You will die for what you did to me.

32.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
32.text: Bone Lord... you're the perfect being... All that is unnecessary stripped away... Primal... innocent... pure...

40.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
40.text: Who was I to you when I was here? Before I was infected?

5.text: Play dumb - let her believe you lost your wits along with your memory.

44.text: Poor, stupid thing. Why is it even here? I thought we sent its pod away so it could be used elsewhere.

8.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
8.text: Poor, stupid thing. Why is it even here? I thought we sent its pod away so it could be used elsewhere.

45.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
45.text: Adorable... I did miss it. Its simplicity, its fear, it thrashing its own head against its pod, cracking its skull again and again in a futile attempt to escape.

58.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
58.text: How precious - sweeter than any person who still has their brain! The things I'd do with you, if I were in command of the parasite piloting you.

59.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
59.text: I think we have to put you down, though, dear one.

35.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
35.text: Something must have gone wrong for you to have wandered all the way back here... even if it is pleasant to be reunited.

2.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
2.text: This won't hurt a bit, though I don't suppose you can feel much now, anyway.

38.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
38.text: Oh, it pains to hear you speak such words against one who adored tending to you so.

0.speaker: Kressa Bonedaughter
0.text: Why bother to tell you this, though? You surely can't understand.

11.text: My mind may be gone, but my blade is sharp!
